item.description:
Come join the Birthday dancing portion at Club Kouzina! Celebrating my birthday on October 2 as well as any other October birthdays.

Eat! Drink! Greek Dance!
Welcome to club Kouzina, were the party is always hot. Every Saturday night we have a live band from 10:00 PM to 1:00 AM. The band plays a lot of popular Greeks hits, from a variety of Greek music.

In front of the band there is a dance floor, which everyone is welcome to dance on. If you’re looking to practice your Greek dancing our dance floor is the place to do it. Whether you’re an expert or just beginning to learn how to Greek dance, the dance floor is welcome to all.

Note: I have never tried their dancing/club area, so please keep an open mind. Don't dance? Then hang out with us for a birthday drink!

Here is their club page http://brotherskouzina.com/club-kouzina.htm

Easy to get to with free parking and located on Rt. 1 North in Peabody.

Dress code: Business Casual. Jeans are ok as I have looked at their pictures.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at a table with a meetup sign.
item.name: October Birthday Celebration - Club Kouzina Dance Portion
